values: Oh, goodness, goodness, goodness. XD More city tricks, huh? What's with the sudden affection? Whoever, the guy who said everyone' making out in the streets? Totally right. It's kinda gross, really. ... Not that I can resist wandering around town like that - thing is... They're so distracted. They don't notice anything else. Time for some grand theft wallet! ((ooc: Uriko's open for rabu rabu. XD She might even rabu rabu you back! Talking like that is a bad habit. D:))

Nn... No more okay? It hurts. The needles and the pills and the experiments hurt. I wanna go home. Alice, Kenji, someone, make it stop. I'm just... Going to curl up now. No more mirrors, no more windows, no more reflections, no more memories, okay? I'll just stay here. All day.

LET'S PLAY GAMES I'M BORED. :OOOOOOOOO


♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥ ♥  ANYONE~? <small><strike>Uriko doesn't wanna be alone.</strike>

An eclipse, an eclipse! I remember studying them at school a long time ago! My science teacher had a poster with a picture of one on the wall. Yeah.

I'm glad I get to see one, it's really cool and pretty! Though it's strange to feel so active and awake and see everyone else being daytime-like when it's so dark.

Practicing with Aya-chan was really fun~ ♥

But I'm actually a little bored lately. I heard there's a garden around. Any butterflies or little bugs to chase there? >3 I'm gonna find out.

I almost almost aaaaaaalmost wish I'd played in the snow. But it's cold. And wet. Wet is bad.

Instead, I curled up by a fire at Roy's house. It was warm and toasty, so I took a nap. I can't help it - warm places make me sleepy. 

I wish there was a way for there to be snow that didn't melt in warm weather. But that's sorta completely impossible. On the other hand, isn't everything about this city? >3

By the way~ Ikki~ When's the tournament? I've been practicing this AT stuff and it's just too cool. ♥
It's so cold! Someone, I don't even care if you're a stranger. Let me cuddle with you for warmth. ;__;

ANBFVKASNfalfca;lda I can't transform anymore! DX

And the monsters are back. I can fight 'em anyway, no problem. But it feels weird not to be able to transform. So very weird. DDDDX
Uriko's fortune says~ "Your talents will be recognized and suitably rewarded." Hehe. But, um... What's that mean?

Alright~ ♥ Time to beat some bad guys up~! I'll be fine, probably. Besides, I can probably bring her out if I need to. Come on guys, show some enthusiasm for my challenge! ;_; Challenge is~ Count keeping~ Anyone up to it? Let's have a contest! How about~ Who can kill the most cockroaches~? I've taken down 27 56 84 149 242 378 414 562 652 900, YEAH. ♥ of these weird-ass cockroach things! I'll even make a prize if someone beats my score. Err, assuming this all ends. This'll all end, won't it? Participants, thus far: So I don't forget ♥ Kurosaki Ichigo - 100 point bonus Xigbar Myself, of course~ Axel - 70 point bonus ♥

FGSFDSAKSAFGLA. DX Awfully rude of <strike>Bakuryu</strike> Keeeenji to push me into the water. I mean, I promised I'd go swimming with him, but... I was just gonna take my time getting into the water. It's very... Wet, after all. Very wet. No good. 

EXCEPT THEN he ditched me - or something. WHERE AM I? I don't like this answer! Is this another stupid tournament?! <strike>I wouldn't mind another tournament. But kidnappings are getting old~</strike>



So what's the prize if I win, and who do I have to fight?
